title: Tahini Muffins with Figs Recipe
full_text:
Tahini Muffins with Figs Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
30 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
35 mins
Makes
12 muffins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
chopped
dried figs
Boiling
water
1 1/4
cups
all purpose flour
3/4
cup
old fashioned oats
2
teaspoons
baking powder
1/2
teaspoon
salt
2/3
cup
tahini
3/4
cup
milk
1
egg
3/4
cup
dark brown sugar
Sesame seeds
Directions
Adjust oven rack to middle position and preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a 12 cup muffin tin with paper liners. Pour boiling water over figs and let stand for 10 minutes to soften, then drain.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, oats, baking powder, and salt; set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together tahini, milk, and egg until smooth. Whisk in brown sugar. Add dry ingredients to bowl and stir until combined. Stir in figs.
Fill muffin tins 3/4 full with batter. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top of each muffin. Bake until golden and a cake tester inserted into the middle of the muffin comes out clean, about 20 minutes.
Special equipment
12 cup muffin tin, paper liners, whisk
